mapper.insert: insert into b_product( product_id, cover, pro_name, pro_abstract,pro_introduction,pro_original_price ,express_fee,is_active,created_user,created_time,modified_user,modified_time) values(#{productId}, #{cover}, #{proName}, #{proAbstract},#{proIntroduction } ,#{proOriginalPrice},#{expressFee},#{isActive},#{ createdUser},#{createdTime},#{modifiedUser },#{modifiedTime})
mapper.delete:
delete from b_product where id in
#{item}
